context: Wayfair is a leading online home goods destination facing profitability challenges post-pandemic. The company cut costs and opened physical stores to capture omnichannel shoppers.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Dominant e-commerce with massive home selection

competitors.name: IKEA
competitors.notes: Global furniture leader with improved e-commerce

competitors.name: Williams-Sonoma
competitors.notes: Premium home brands including West Elm, Pottery Barn

competitors.name: Target
competitors.notes: Mass retailer with strong home and design assortment

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Largest retailer with home goods online and in-store

competitors.name: Home Depot/Lowe's
competitors.notes: Home improvement retailers with furnishing expansion
